PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: At PixelBeads, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website.
PrivacyPolicy.section1Content: We do not require user accounts. However, we may collect minimal data such as browser type, referring pages, and timestamp for analytical purposes. When you upload an image, it is processed locally in your browser or temporarily on our server to generate the pattern and is not stored permanently.
PrivacyPolicy.section2Content: The information we collect is used to improve our service, analyze usage trends, and ensure the security of our website.
PrivacyPolicy.section3Content: We use Google AdSense to serve ads. Google may use cookies to serve ads based on your prior visits to our website or other websites. You can opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Google Ad Settings.
PrivacyPolicy.section4Content: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.
PrivacyPolicy.section5Content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these websites.
PrivacyPolicy.section6Content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
PrivacyPolicy.section7Content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfService.intro: Welcome to PixelBeads. By accessing or using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service.
TermsOfService.section1Content: PixelBeads provides a tool for creating perler bead patterns from images. You may use this service for personal and non-commercial purposes only, unless otherwise authorized by us.
TermsOfService.section2Content: You agree not to use the service for any unlawful purpose or to upload any content that is offensive, harmful, or infringes on the intellectual property rights of others.
TermsOfService.section3Content: The content and tools on PixelBeads are protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our permission.
TermsOfService.section4Content: The service is provided "as is" without any warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted or error-free.
TermsOfService.section5Content: In no event shall PixelBeads be liable for any damages arising out of your use of or inability to use the service.
TermsOfService.section6Content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Your continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
TermsOfService.section7Content: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which we operate.

ImageToPixel.metaTitle: Convert Image to Perler Beads Pattern | Free Pattern Generator
ImageToPixel.metaDescription: Transform your photos into clear, printable perler bead patterns. Customize grid size, match colors accurately, and get bead count statistics. Download HD PDF or images - a professional perler bead pattern generator.
ImageToPixel.h1: Convert Image to Perler Beads Pattern | Free Pattern Generator
ImageToPixel.heroDescription: Transform photos into clear, printable perler bead patterns. Customize grid and colors, get accurate bead counts, and complete your bead art easily.
ImageToPixel.h2WhatIs: What Are Perler Bead Patterns? Who Can Use Them?
ImageToPixel.whatIsContent: Perler bead patterns are pixelated design charts that convert images into grid patterns made of colored beads. Using perler bead patterns, you can create beautiful 3D art pieces by following the colors and positions on the chart using beads from brands like Perler, Hama, Artkal, and more.
ImageToPixel.whoCanUse1: Perler Bead Enthusiasts: Creators who want to convert photos and designs into bead patterns
ImageToPixel.whoCanUse2: Family Crafts: Parents and children creating bead art together
ImageToPixel.whoCanUse3: Educational Use: Teachers creating materials for art and craft classes
ImageToPixel.whoCanUse4: Pixel Art Lovers: Artists who love pixel style and retro gaming aesthetics
ImageToPixel.h2HowToConvert: How to Convert Images to Perler Bead Patterns
ImageToPixel.step1Desc: Select a photo from your device. High-contrast images work best. Clear separation between subject and background produces better conversion results.
ImageToPixel.step2Desc: Choose your preferred bead brand (Perler, Hama, Artkal, Mard, etc.). The system will automatically match the closest colors.
ImageToPixel.step3Desc: Use brush tools to perfect pixels, adjust details, and polish each color area to ensure the pattern is clear and easy to read.
ImageToPixel.step4Desc: Download HD PDF patterns and instructions, including bead count statistics and color shopping lists, ready to start creating.
ImageToPixel.h2CustomSettings: What Custom Settings Are Supported for Pattern Generation
ImageToPixel.customGridDesc: From tiny coasters (20×20) to massive wall art (100×100+), adjust dimensions exactly as needed. Support for any width and height settings to meet different creation needs.
ImageToPixel.customColorTitle: Accurate Color Matching with Brand Codes
ImageToPixel.customColorDesc: Automatically match image colors to real bead brand codes, supporting mainstream brands like Perler, Hama, Artkal, Mard. Display brand color codes in real-time for easy purchasing.
ImageToPixel.customStatsDesc: Automatically calculate the number of beads needed for each color, generating detailed shopping lists. No manual counting required - just purchase according to the list.
ImageToPixel.h2DownloadFormats: What Formats Can Bead Patterns Be Downloaded In
ImageToPixel.formatPdfDesc: Includes colored grid, color code labels, bead statistics, and instructions. A4 size, ready to print and use, perfect for offline creation reference.
ImageToPixel.formatImageDesc: High-resolution image formats, suitable for viewing on phones, tablets, and other devices, or sharing on social media. Supports transparent background option.
ImageToPixel.h2WhyChoose: Why Choose This Perler Bead Assistant Tool
ImageToPixel.advantage1Desc: Not just generating patterns - directly tells you how many beads and which colors you need, enhancing real-world creation value.
ImageToPixel.advantage2Desc: Not screenshot-style output, optimized specifically for bead creation. Clear lines, precise alignment, print-friendly, making the creation process smoother.
ImageToPixel.advantage3Desc: Completely free to use, no account registration needed. All processing happens locally in your browser, protecting your privacy and security.
ImageToPixel.advantage4Desc: Supports mainstream brands like Perler, Hama, Artkal, Mard, automatically matching closest colors to ensure creation results.
ImageToPixel.faq1Question: Can I use bead patterns for Minecraft?
ImageToPixel.faq1Answer: Absolutely! Our grid output is perfect for Minecraft block placement. Just upload your image, adjust the size to fit your build area, and follow the grid.
ImageToPixel.faq2Question: How do I print the pattern?
ImageToPixel.faq2Answer: Once you're happy with the conversion in our generator, click the "Export PDF" button. This will generate a printable document containing the colored grid and a list of all required bead colors.
ImageToPixel.faq3Answer: Yes. All image processing happens in your browser. Your photos are not uploaded to our servers, completely protecting your privacy.
ImageToPixel.faq4Answer: We support mainstream bead brands like Perler, Hama, Artkal, Mard, each with a complete color code matching system.
ImageToPixel.structuredDataDescription: Free online perler bead pattern generator that converts photos to bead patterns, with custom grid, accurate color matching, and bead count statistics.
ImageToPixel.structuredDataFeature1: Convert JPG/PNG to Perler Bead Patterns

ImageToPixelConverter.metaTitle: Image to Pixel Converter | Turn Photos into Pixel Art Free
ImageToPixelConverter.metaDescription: Convert any image to pixel art instantly. Our free online tool helps you create fuse bead patterns, Minecraft art, and cross-stitch charts from your photos.
ImageToPixelConverter.heroDescription: Transform any photo into a detailed pixel art masterpiece. Perfect for Fuse beads, Minecraft builds, Cross-stitch, and Sprite art.
ImageToPixelConverter.feature1Desc: Control the pixel density. Go for a retro 8-bit look with chunky pixels or high-definition for intricate portraits.
ImageToPixelConverter.feature2Desc: Automatically match your image colors to real-world bead brands like Perler, Hama, and Artkal.
ImageToPixelConverter.feature3Desc: Get a downloadable PDF with a numbered grid and color shopping list to build your project in real life.
ImageToPixelConverter.tip1Desc: Images with clear separation between subject and background convert best. Busy backgrounds can become "noise" in pixel art.
ImageToPixelConverter.tip2Desc: Logos, cartoons, and close-up portraits work better than landscapes or large group photos.
ImageToPixelConverter.tip3Desc: Avoid photos with harsh shadows or extreme gradients, as these can create strange artifacts when reduced to a limited color palette.
ImageToPixelConverter.faq1Question: Can I use this for Minecraft?
ImageToPixelConverter.faq1Answer: Absolutely! Our grid output is perfect for Minecraft block placement. Just upload your image, adjust the size to fit your build area, and follow the grid.
ImageToPixelConverter.faq2Question: How do I print the pattern?
ImageToPixelConverter.faq2Answer: Once you are happy with the conversion in our generator, click the "Export PDF" button. This will generate a printable document containing the colored grid and a list of all required bead colors.
ImageToPixelConverter.faq3Answer: Yes. All image processing happens in your browser. Your photos are not uploaded to our servers.
ImageToPixelConverter.structuredDataDescription: Convert any image to pixel art instantly. Our free online tool helps you create fuse bead patterns, Minecraft art, and cross-stitch charts from your photos.

PixelArtMaker.metaTitle: Pixel Art Maker | Free Online Pixel Art Drawing Tool
PixelArtMaker.metaDescription: The best free online pixel art maker. Draw pixel art, create game sprites, and design bead patterns. No login required. Export to PNG or PDF.
PixelArtMaker.heroDescription: A powerful, free online tool for creating pixel art, game sprites, and bead patterns. Simple enough for beginners, powerful enough for pros.
PixelArtMaker.feature1Desc: Choose any grid size from 8x8 icons to 100x100 scenes. Resizing is instant.
PixelArtMaker.feature2Desc: Download your work as high-resolution PNGs or printer-friendly PDFs with grid numbers.
PixelArtMaker.feature3Desc: Jump straight into creating. We store your session locally so you don't lose progress.
PixelArtMaker.gameSpritesDesc: Perfect for indie game developers. Create characters, items, and environments. Our transparent background export makes it easy to import directly into engines like Unity or Godot.
PixelArtMaker.beadStitchDesc: Turn on the "Bead Mode" to see color codes for Perler, Hama, or Artkal beads. It's the easiest way to plan your physical crafts before buying supplies.
PixelArtMaker.sectionWhyUseTitle: Why Use an Online Pixel Editor?
PixelArtMaker.whyUsePara1: Traditional image editors like Photoshop can be overkill for pixel art. They blur pixels when resizing and handle anti-aliasing in ways that ruin the crisp pixel aesthetic.
PixelArtMaker.whyUsePara2: Our Pixel Art Maker is built specifically for this medium. It ensures every pixel stays sharp (nearest-neighbor interpolation), provides specialized tools like a "pixel-perfect" pencil, and handles strict color palettes to ensure your art looks authentic to the 8-bit and 16-bit eras.
